tool_description: Analyzes geochemical assay data to calculate grade statistics, detect anomalies, and identify geochemical signatures and correlations between elements.

assay_data_path.description: Path to geochemical assay data file

primary_elements.description: Primary elements of interest for detailed analysis

detection_limits.description: Detection limits corresponding to each primary element

anomaly_threshold.description: Threshold in standard deviations for anomaly detection

correlation_threshold.description: Minimum correlation coefficient for element associations

sample_type.description: Type of samples analyzed: rock, soil, stream_sediment, or drill_core

quality_control.description: Whether to perform quality control analysis on standards and duplicates

error_messages: Assay data file not found: Ensure the assay_data_path points to a valid data file.
Element-detection limit mismatch: The number of primary_elements must match the number of detection_limits.
Invalid threshold values: anomaly_threshold must be > 0, correlation_threshold must be between 0 and 1.
Unsupported sample type: Use one of [rock, soil, stream_sediment, drill_core].
Insufficient data: Need at least 10 samples for meaningful statistical analysis.
Missing required columns: Assay data must contain columns for all specified primary elements.
usage: Provide assay data file path, specify primary elements and their detection limits. Optionally adjust thresholds for anomaly detection and correlation analysis. The tool returns comprehensive geochemical statistics and interpretations.

element_statistics.description: Statistical summary for each analyzed element

anomaly_count.description: Number of samples identified as geochemical anomalies

element_correlations.description: Significant element correlation pairs and coefficients

geochemical_signature.description: Interpreted geochemical signature and mineralization indicators

quality_metrics.description: Quality control metrics including precision and accuracy measures
